list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: sail about in an area without a precise destination, especially for pleasure.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they were cruising off the California coast
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ đang bay khỏi bờ biển California

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a motor vehicle or aircraft) travel smoothly at a moderate or economical speed.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we sit in a jet, cruising at some 30,000 ft
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi ngồi trong một máy bay phản lực, bay ở khoảng 30.000 ft

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a young child) walk while holding on to furniture or other structures, prior to learning to walk without support.
a voyage on a ship or boat taken for pleasure or as a vacation and usually calling in at several places.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một hành trình xuống sông Nile
